Date Picker Examples
{{$ctrl.singleDate}} 
<date-picker selected-date="$ctrl.singleDate" format="$ctrl.format"></date-picker>
{{$ctrl.existingDate}} 
<date-picker selected-date="$ctrl.existingDate" format="$ctrl.format"></date-picker>
{{$ctrl.singleDate2}} 
<date-picker selected-date="$ctrl.singleDate2"></date-picker>
{{$ctrl.minDate}} {{$ctrl.maxDate}} 
<date-picker selected-date="$ctrl.selectedDate" format="$ctrl.format" min-date="$ctrl.minDate" max-date="$ctrl.maxDate"></date-picker>
Invalid Date

Must provide name attribute and be within a form. Must also provide error message after date-picker with date-picker-error class and ng-if checking for formName.pickerName.$invalid. 

<form name="errorForm">
 <label>Single Date Picker w/Error Message</label>
 <date-picker selected-date="$ctrl.errorDate" format="$ctrl.format" name="errorDate"></date-picker>
 <span class="date-picker-error" ng-if="errorForm.errorDate.$invalid">Invalid Date</span>
</form>
 
<date-picker selected-date="$ctrl.singleDate" format="$ctrl.format" disabled="true"></date-picker>
{{$ctrl.startDate}} {{$ctrl.endDate}} 
<date-picker is-range="true" start-date="$ctrl.startDate" end-date="$ctrl.endDate" format="$ctrl.format"></date-picker>
{{$ctrl.existingStart}} {{$ctrl.existingEnd}} 
<date-picker is-range="true" start-date="$ctrl.existingStart" end-date="$ctrl.existingEnd" format="$ctrl.format"></date-picker>
 
<date-picker is-range="true" include-inputs="true" start-date="$ctrl.startDate2" end-date="$ctrl.endDate2" format="$ctrl.format"></date-picker>
{{$ctrl.minDate}} {{$ctrl.maxDate}} 
<date-picker is-range="true" format="$ctrl.format" range-min-date="$ctrl.minDate" range-max-date="$ctrl.maxDate" start-date="$ctrl.startDate2" end-date="$ctrl.endDate2"></date-picker>
 
<date-picker is-range="true" start-date="$ctrl.startDate" end-date="$ctrl.endDate" format="$ctrl.format" disabled="true"></date-picker>
{{$ctrl.startDate}} {{$ctrl.endDate}} 
<date-picker is-range="true" start-date="$ctrl.startDate" end-date="$ctrl.endDate" format="$ctrl.format" apply-callback="$ctrl.callback()"></date-picker>
